attributes.background:
As our British system of currency was originally £ s d. The nation during the exit of Europe must revert to these currency units.
Metrication especially of weight. Causes difficulty to know exactly what you buy. All units of measure should be imperial and made law.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you'd like the law to be changed so that retailers have to show all weights and measures in imperial units, you could start a new petition asking for that.
